title: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray
description:
opular in various fields such as anime, games, and manga!
The latest series of “Uma Musume Pretty Derby” has appeared in YJ magazine!
The hero is that strongest horse girl who was very popular in anime!? From the
region to the central legend.
The youth “running” Cinderella story is finally out! !!
It is a story until the girl with ash hair is called a “monster”.
author: Cygames
